name: Easy Cheeseburger Pizza
author: Holly Beauvais
summary: The taste of a cheeseburger in pizza form! Optional: squeeze ketchup over pizza and top with shredded lettuce.
ingredients: 1 (13.8 ounce) can refrigerated pizza dough (such as Pillsbury®)
directions: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C)
Grease a baking sheet with nonstick cooking spray; unroll pizza dough over the baking sheet
Bake in the preheated oven until golden, about 8 minutes
Meanwhile, cook and stir beef and onion in a skillet over medium heat until beef is browned and crumbly, 5 to 7 minutes
Mix mayonnaise and mustard together in a small bowl
Layer beef-onion mixture, Cheddar cheese, and pickles on top
Return to the oven and bake until crust is dark golden brown, 6 to 10 minutes
